name: Ten Usability Heuristics
description:
Jacob Nielsen's ten usability heuristics

  1. Visibility of System Status
  2. Match Between System & the Real World
  3. User Control & Freedom
  4. Consistency & Standards
  5. Error Prevention
  6. Recognition Rather Than Recall
  7. Flexibility & Efficiency of Use
  8. Aesthetic & Minimalist Design
  9. Recognize, Diagnose & Recover from Error
  10. Help & Documentation


Source:

  • Experience, W. L. in R.-B. U. (n.d.). 10 usability heuristics for user interface design. Nielsen Norman Group. Retrieved May 14, 2022, from https://www.nngroup.com/articles/ten-usability-heuristics/
